mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (res_seq, content, rating, createdAt) VALUES (#{res_seq}, #{content}, #{rating}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT r.res_seq, r.restaurant_seq, r.member_seq, rv.res_seq AS existing_review FROM reservation r LEFT JOIN review rv ON r.res_seq = rv.res_seq WHERE r.res_status = 'OK' AND r.res_seq = #{res_seq}
SELECT COUNT(*) as review_count, AVG(rating) as rating_avg from reservation r LEFT JOIN review v ON r.res_seq = v.res_seq WHERE restaurant_seq= #{restaurant_seq} AND rating IS NOT NULL;

SELECT a.rating, COALESCE(b.count, 0) AS count FROM ( SELECT 1 AS rating UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5 ) a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT rating, COUNT(*) AS count FROM reservation r LEFT JOIN review v ON r.res_seq = v.res_seq WHERE r.restaurant_seq = #{restaurant_seq} AND v.rating IS NOT NULL AND v.rating BETWEEN 1 AND 5 GROUP BY v.rating ) b ON a.rating = b.rating order by rating desc;
